nnsight documentation¶

nnsight (/ɛn.saɪt/) is a Python library for the mechanistic interpretability of open LLMs. It offers an intuitive API for accessing the internal operations of models hosted on the National Deep Inferencing Framework.

Check out the Getting Started section for further information, including how to install the project.
